content: Write a tweet announcing the invention of teleportation, written by Elon Musk.

🚨 BREAKING NEWS 🚨

Elon Musk just tweeted about the invention of teleportation! Can't believe it's real. Imagine beaming yourself anywhere in an instant. The future is here! #Teleportation #ElonMusk #Innovation

P.S. I'm ready to beam to Mars now! 🚀✨ #SpaceX #FutureTech
